name: all_crypto
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool investing_financial_stocks.
Tool description: get all investing.com stocks realtime data in multi language and filters
API description: Fetches a datatable of cryptocurrency information from the RapidAPI endpoint.

page.description: The page number of the data to retrieve. Defaults to '1'.

lang.description: The language code for the data. Defaults to 'en'.
